mapper.select: SELECT v.id, v.video_url, c.scenery, c.latitude, c.longitude, v.summary, d.detected_object_id, c2.name, o.crop_img_url, o.feature FROM video v INNER JOIN public.detection d on v.id = d.video_id INNER JOIN public.camera c on c.id = v.camera_id INNER JOIN public.detected_object o on o.id = d.detected_object_id INNER JOIN public.categories c2 on c2.id = o.category_id WHERE v.id = #{id}

SELECT v.video_url, v.summary, o.alias, o.crop_img_url, d.appeared_time, d.exit_time, c.name, o.feature FROM video v INNER JOIN public.detection d on v.id = d.video_id INNER JOIN public.detected_object o on o.id = d.detected_object_id INNER JOIN public.categories c on c.id = o.category_id WHERE d.id = #{mobileDetectionId} LIMIT 1

SELECT v.video_url, v.summary, o.alias, d.appeared_time, d.exit_time, c.name FROM video v INNER JOIN public.detection d on v.id = d.video_id INNER JOIN public.detected_object o on d.detected_object_id = o.id INNER JOIN public.categories c on c.id = o.category_id WHERE o.id = #{fixedObjectId} LIMIT 1
